parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

parameters.name: hide_empty
parameters.description: Whether to hide resources not assigned to any products.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: Limit result set to resources assigned to a specific parent.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Limit result set to resources assigned to a specific product.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Limit result set to resources with a specific slug.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the resource unique to its type.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: The ID for the parent of the resource.

parameters.name: menu_order
parameters.description: Menu order, used to custom sort the resource.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Limit response to resources published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Limit response to resources published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Limit result set to resources with a specific code.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of discount. Should always be numeric, even if setting a percentage.

parameters.name: discount_type
parameters.description: Determines the type of discount that will be applied.

parameters.name: date_expires
parameters.description: The date the coupon expires, in the site's timezone.

parameters.name: date_expires_gmt
parameters.description: The date the coupon expires, as GMT.

parameters.name: individual_use
parameters.description: If true, the coupon can only be used individually. Other applied coupons will be removed from the cart.

parameters.name: product_ids
parameters.description: List of product IDs the coupon can be used on.

parameters.name: excluded_product_ids
parameters.description: List of product IDs the coupon cannot be used on.

parameters.name: usage_limit
parameters.description: How many times the coupon can be used in total.

parameters.name: usage_limit_per_user
parameters.description: How many times the coupon can be used per customer.

parameters.name: limit_usage_to_x_items
parameters.description: Max number of items in the cart the coupon can be applied to.

parameters.name: free_shipping
parameters.description: If true and if the free shipping method requires a coupon, this coupon will enable free shipping.

parameters.name: product_categories
parameters.description: List of category IDs the coupon applies to.

parameters.name: excluded_product_categories
parameters.description: List of category IDs the coupon does not apply to.

parameters.name: exclude_sale_items
parameters.description: If true, this coupon will not be applied to items that have sale prices.

parameters.name: minimum_amount
parameters.description: Minimum order amount that needs to be in the cart before coupon applies.

parameters.name: maximum_amount
parameters.description: Maximum order amount allowed when using the coupon.

parameters.name: email_restrictions
parameters.description: List of email addresses that can use this coupon.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Limit response to resources published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Limit response to reviews published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

parameters.name: reviewer
parameters.description: Limit result set to reviews assigned to specific user IDs.

parameters.name: reviewer_exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes reviews assigned to specific user IDs.

parameters.name: reviewer_email
parameters.description: Limit result set to that from a specific author email.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Limit result set to reviews assigned to specific product IDs.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Limit result set to reviews assigned a specific status.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

parameters.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: Limit result set to those of particular parent IDs.

parameters.name: parent_exclude
parameters.description: Limit result set to all items except those of a particular parent ID.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Limit result set to products with a specific slug.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific status.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific type.

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Limit result set to products with specific SKU(s). Use commas to separate.

parameters.name: featured
parameters.description: Limit result set to featured products.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific category ID.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific tag ID.

parameters.name: shipping_class
parameters.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific shipping class ID.

parameters.name: attribute
parameters.description: Limit result set to products with a specific attribute. Use the taxonomy name/attribute slug.

parameters.name: attribute_term
parameters.description: Limit result set to products with a specific attribute term ID (required an assigned attribute).

parameters.name: tax_class
parameters.description: Limit result set to products with a specific tax class.

parameters.name: on_sale
parameters.description: Limit result set to products on sale.

parameters.name: min_price
parameters.description: Limit result set to products based on a minimum price.

parameters.name: max_price
parameters.description: Limit result set to products based on a maximum price.

parameters.name: stock_status
parameters.description: Limit result set to products with specified stock status.

parameters.name: date_created
parameters.description: The date the product was created, in the site's timezone.

parameters.name: date_created_gmt
parameters.description: The date the product was created, as GMT.

parameters.name: date_on_sale_from
parameters.description: Start date of sale price, in the site's timezone.

parameters.name: date_on_sale_from_gmt
parameters.description: Start date of sale price, as GMT.

parameters.name: date_on_sale_to
parameters.description: End date of sale price, in the site's timezone.

parameters.name: date_on_sale_to_gmt
parameters.description: End date of sale price, in the site's timezone.

parameters.name: download_limit
parameters.description: Number of times downloadable files can be downloaded after purchase.

parameters.name: download_expiry
parameters.description: Number of days until access to downloadable files expires.

parameters.name: external_url
parameters.description: Product external URL. Only for external products.

parameters.name: button_text
parameters.description: Product external button text. Only for external products.

parameters.name: stock_status
parameters.description: Controls the stock status of the product.

parameters.name: backorders
parameters.description: If managing stock, this controls if backorders are allowed.

parameters.name: sold_individually
parameters.description: Allow one item to be bought in a single order.

parameters.name: purchase_note
parameters.description: Optional note to send the customer after purchase.

parameters.name: menu_order
parameters.description: Menu order, used to custom sort products.
